data.detailed_description:
TOSS!üçå is a bananas VR action platformer. BE THE MONKEY and use your strength to swing and toss yourself across challenging obstacle courses.
  • VR action platformer ‚òÄ
  • Be the monkey üêµ
  • Go bananas üçå
  • Beat challenging obstacle courses üî•
  • Rank up to black belt tosser in unique challenges ü•ã

Features:

  • Bright & happy colors set the mood in this bananas VR climbing platformer
  • Explore a colorful & vibrant world through a journey high above the clouds and beyond
  • Use your hands to swing and toss your way to the end of each level
  • Adventure through dozens of handcrafted jungle gym playgrounds
  • Upcoming: Complete challenges such as time attack and counting your grabs & tosses to unlock new levels
  • Upcoming: Compete with your friends and people all over the world on the leaderboards

data.short_description: A bananas VR action platformer where you play as an acrobatic ape with the strength to swing and toss yourself freely between obstacles in challenging playgrounds üçå

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Any i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Additional Notes: Network required for leaderboards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Any i7 or Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 1070
  • Additional Notes: Network required for leaderboards
